backend/main.mo: Defines the backend actor with types, authorization mixins, storage logic, mission/task structures, and health/diagnostic queries plus ID counters and maps for files, notes, folders, and missions.
feature_evidence.json: Contains feature evidence entries mapping PWA‑related requirements to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs with high-confidence verification data.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Lists concise per-file frontend descriptions summarizing component roles, behaviors, hooks, styling, and data-flow characteristics.
frontend/DRAFT_BASELINE_V114.md: Documents creation of Draft Baseline V114, confirming 1:1 parity with the live version and detailing validation steps, constraints, and smoke-test guidance.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and component layers defining OKLCH color variables, light/dark themes, and global styling.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry with PWA meta tags, icons, and service worker registration for the MYL app.
frontend/PAUSE_AFTER_RESTORE.md: Declares a post-restore change freeze, outlining prohibited modifications, permitted documentation updates, and required user approval for future changes.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest defining MYL app metadata, icons, display settings, and categories.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing precaching, runtime caching with limits, and network‑first navigation handling.
frontend/PWA_INSTALLABILITY_NOTES.md: Provides a detailed checklist for verifying PWA installability on Chrome Android, covering manifest fields, service worker requirements, icons, and troubleshooting steps.
frontend/RESTORE_LIVE_V114_CHECKLIST.md: Checklist verifying frontend code and behavior match Live v114, covering auth, UI, components, hooks, and utilities.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root app component managing theme, providers, and intro screen logic triggered on login or app resume.
frontend/src/components/ActorInitErrorSt: Error UI component showing classified actor initialization failures with details, retry, and logout actions.
frontend/src/components/AnimatedGalleryI: Renders an animated SVG target-style gallery icon with hover effects.
frontend/src/components/DecorativeBottom: Renders a fixed bottom horizontal line used as a decorative UI element.
frontend/src/components/ExternalOpenFall: Dialog shown when a file fails to open in a new window, offering retry and download options.
frontend/src/components/FilePreviewDialo: Dialog for previewing files with support for images, videos, PDFs, Office docs, and file actions like download or delete.
frontend/src/components/FileUploadSectio: Handles file, link, and note uploads with progress tracking, speech-to-text support, and validation.
frontend/src/components/FoldersButton.ts: Clickable button that opens the folders view, displaying a styled folder icon.
frontend/src/components/FoldersDialog.ts: Deprecated folder management dialog supporting creation, renaming, deletion, and selection of folders.
frontend/src/components/FoldersFullScree: Full‑screen folder management UI allowing creation, editing, deletion, and selection of folders.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer showing copyright text and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/FullScreenViewer: Full-screen file viewer with swipe navigation, file actions (delete, download, share), and dialogs for folder or mission moves and external-open fallback.
frontend/src/components/GallerySection.t: Renders a gallery of files and notes with selection, long-press handling, preview dialogs, and file/note actions like delete, move, share, and open.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Top navigation bar with theme toggle, auth menu, app title, and a global progress bar.
frontend/src/components/IntroScreen.tsx: Splash intro screen showing an animated icon that fades out after a timed transition.
frontend/src/components/LinkOpenFallback: Dialog shown when a link cannot be opened, offering retry and copy-to-clipboard options.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Button that triggers Internet Identity login and shows a loading state while authenticating.
frontend/src/components/MissionDetailFul: Full-screen mission view with tasks, autosave, attached files/notes, and preview dialogs.
frontend/src/components/MissionEditorDia: Dialog for creating missions, including title input, task list editing, and mission submission.
frontend/src/components/MissionsButton.t: Renders a fixed missions button with icon, hover animations, and disabled/overlay states.
frontend/src/components/MissionsFullScre: Displays a full-screen missions list with swipe actions, mission creation, deletion, filtering, and detail navigation.
frontend/src/components/MobileOnlyLayout: Wraps children in a container intended for mobile-only display.
frontend/src/components/MoveToMissionDia: Dialog for moving selected files or notes into a mission, showing mission list and handling mutations.
frontend/src/components/NoteViewerDialog: Viewer dialog for a note with options to send, download, share, or delete.
frontend/src/components/SendToFolderDial: Dialog for moving or removing items from folders with folder list and mutation handling.
Provides a swipeable row with edit and delete actions, managing swipe gestures and animations.
frontend/src/components/UnifiedProgressB: Shows a global upload progress bar when uploads are active.
frontend/src/components/WelcomeIntroScre: Displays an introductory screen with a target-themed SVG graphic, descriptive text, and a login button layout.
frontend/src/contexts/ActorContext.tsx: Manages creation and lifecycle of the backend actor with retry logic, error handling, and authentication integration.
frontend/src/contexts/UploadContext.tsx: Provides context for tracking upload items with progress updates, batching, legacy APIs, and requestAnimationFrame coalescing.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor using react-query, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useHomePrefetch.ts: Prefetches core home-page data once per authenticated session when the actor becomes ready.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity authentication flow, exposing identity state, login, logout, and status flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useIntroOnAppResume.t: Runs a callback when the app regains focus or visibility while the user is authenticated.
frontend/src/hooks/useIsCoarsePointer.ts: Detects whether the device uses a coarse pointer, indicating a touch-based interface.
frontend/src/hooks/useMissionAutosave.ts: Provides a debounced autosave hook for missions with change detection, mission switching reset, and queued save handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useMissionsQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for listing, fetching, creating, and updating missions with actor checks and targeted cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useNotesQueries.ts: Implements React Query hooks for fetching, creating, and deleting notes, including folder and mission filtering with concurrency limiting.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Contains React Query hooks for files and folders, including paginated fetches, mission-specific queries, and limited‑concurrency uploads.
frontend/src/hooks/useSpeechToText.ts: Provides a speech‑to‑text hook using browser recognition APIs with handling for transcripts, interim results, errors, and lifecycle.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and extensive CSS variables for light/dark themes and component styling.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Provides a helper function to merge conditional classnames using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider, then renders App.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Implements the main home screen with authentication checks, data fetching, and lazy-loaded full-screen views.
frontend/src/utils/actorInitializationMe: Defines error messages and helpers to classify actor initialization, stopped canister, and auth token errors.
frontend/src/utils/externalOpen.ts: Utilities for opening external URLs, downloading files or notes, and sharing files via Web Share API.
frontend/src/utils/fileOpenRules.ts: Determines how files should open based on MIME type, including viewer, office preview, or download rules.
frontend/src/utils/filePreview.ts: Categorizes files by MIME type, checks preview support, and provides human-readable file type labels.
frontend/src/utils/missionCompletion.ts: Calculates mission progress, checks completion status, and splits missions into completed and incomplete groups.
frontend/src/utils/missionTaskCompare.ts: Performs BigInt-safe comparison of task arrays by matching IDs, text, and completion flags.
frontend/src/utils/notesTime.ts: Empty or placeholder file with no implementation.
frontend/src/utils/performanceDiagnostic: Provides an opt-in performance timing utility that logs durations of operations with optional metadata.
frontend/src/utils/reactQueryDiagnostics: Logs React Query mutation lifecycle events in development mode for debugging.
frontend/src/utils/smokeTestCoreFlows.ts: Runs development-only backend smoke tests for creating folders, missions, links, and notes, and formats the results.
frontend/src/utils/uploadConcurrency.ts: Implements a simple concurrency limiter to control parallel async operations.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters with sessionStorage persistence and hash support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, animations, and content paths with custom design tokens.
frontend/V114_BASELINE_FRONTEND_FILES.tx: Canonical list of all frontend files defining the v114 baseline used for drift detection and validation.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s PWA-related goals, requirements, and current architectural notes for MYL.
